name: Vishal R.
text: I had some development experience before (backend) and I wanted to really learn JavaScript and I must tell you, this is the best JavaScript course on the internet period. It has everything you need to get you up to speed and more!!! Apart from innovative challenges and awesome projects, what I personally really admired was the fact that Jonas really took a lot of effort in explaining 'How JS works under the hood' and that is the most precious thing in this course, and just what I wanted.

name: Prajwal M.
text: Great job!! I am searching for android project and I got this tutorial of some bunches of hours compare to other tutorials so I bought it and now I am very satisfies to buy this course. But the this is I need to get my doubt clear within 3-4hrs after asked my question.

name: Colleen W.
text: George is a fantastic educator and clearly knows what he is speaking about. He is well spoken and clear. The pace is great and he brings in examples that help to understand it even further. Having some prior knowledge in blockchain and crypto already, I feel that George brought more clarity to things that I thought I had already known. Nice refresher!

name: Elizabeth P.
text: I have previous experience trying to learn HTML and CSS in my graphic design courses a decade ago but it was taught by someone who had trouble teaching. Only one person in the class really had a handle on things, and most people didn't do very well with his assignments. Some even had to learn outside of class in order to understand. I think I've already learned more in 3 little 5 minute videos just presenting the material than I understood in his jargon-riddled syllabus. Thank you!
